mapper.select:
select pr.pr_name, ss.quantity, co.co_supplyPrice, pa.pa_name
from shippingstatement sh
inner join shippingstatus ss on sh.ss_id = ss.ss_id inner join purchaseorder po on ss.po_id = po.po_id inner join procurementplanregistration ppr on po.ppr_id = ppr.ppr_id inner join contract co on ppr.co_id = co.co_id inner join estimate es on co.es_id = es.es_id inner join product pr on es.pr_id = pr.pr_id inner join partner pa on es.pa_id = pa.pa_id
where ss_status = "제작완료" and ss_deliverySchedule = "일정준수";
